name: Gender Quest
description:
"Hello girl." Well, not "girl" clearly, but Then what is your gender ? 

In this game, follow the path of a questioning person, and their process to understand and express themselves, the difficulties they come across along the way, and the doubt they go through.

In the two room about coming out, trigger warning for transphobia , name calling, threats, and suicide baiting.

Thank you to Gabe for giving me advices about the thing I presented in my game.

_________

If you see anything wrong in term of representation please contact me to let me know. if you see nothing wrong, odn't hesitate to let a comment anyway.
